categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ray'en was a male Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Darth Marr's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite Yavin Coalition along with forces of the Galactic Republic under Jedi Grand Master Satele Shan. While there he asked a fellow Coalition member to eliminate Revanite commanders to reduce the effectiveness of their rank and file soldiers.
Lord Ray'en appears as a Sith Warrior gear vendor in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
